title: Pikangikum
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Robert Verrall, John Kemeny and John Gould
brief_description: In this film, made originally for theatrical use, the mood of the Pikangikum Indian Reserve in northern Ontario is evoked through snatches of dialogue and drawings by John Gould.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Robert Verrall, John Kemeny and John Gould
